original: [Root.GetTitledName] led the reformation of the [Root.Religion.GetName], and copies of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] were spread and read everywhere to honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]领导了[Root.Religion.GetName]的改革，使得[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的抄本传遍各地，让[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的光辉遍布世界。

original: The [Root.Religion.GetName] faith was reformed, and copies of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] were spread and read everywhere to honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName]信仰被人成功改革，[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的抄本被各地人们所传诵，使[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的荣光传遍每个角落。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] declared that Shiva would henceforth be [Root.GetHerHis] patron.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]宣布，湿婆神今后将是[Root.GetHerHis]守护神。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] declared that Vishnu would henceforth be [Root.GetHerHis] patron.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]宣布，毗湿奴神今后将是[Root.GetHerHis]守护神。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] declared that Brahma would henceforth be [Root.GetHerHis] patron.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]宣布，大梵天神今后将是[Root.GetHerHis]守护神。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] declared that Kali would henceforth be [Root.GetHerHis] patron.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]宣布，迦梨时母神今后将是[Root.GetHerHis]守护神。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] declared that Ganesha would henceforth be [Root.GetHerHis] patron.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]宣布，象头神今后将是[Root.GetHerHis]守护神。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] declared that Ganga would henceforth be [Root.GetHerHis] patron.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]宣布，恒河女神今后将是[Root.GetHerHis]守护神。

original: It became known that [Root.GetTitledName] now honored the Shaivist tradition.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.GetTitledName]以秉持湿婆派的传统信仰而倍感荣耀。

original: It became known that [Root.GetTitledName] now honored the Vaishnavist tradition.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.GetTitledName]以秉持着毗湿奴派的信仰传统而骄傲。

original: It became known that [Root.GetTitledName] now honored the Shaktist tradition.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.GetTitledName]以秉持着性力派信仰传统而骄傲。

original: It became known that [Root.GetTitledName] now honored the Smartist tradition.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.GetTitledName]以秉持着传承派的信仰传统而骄傲。

original: It became known that [Root.GetTitledName] now honored the Mahayana tradition.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.GetTitledName]以秉持着大乘佛教信仰传统而骄傲。

original: It became known that [Root.GetTitledName] now honored the Vajrayana tradition.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.GetTitledName]以秉持着金刚乘佛教信仰传统而骄傲。

original: It became known that [Root.GetTitledName] now honored the Theravada tradition.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.GetTitledName]以秉持着上座部佛教信仰传统而骄傲。

original: It became known that [Root.GetTitledName] now honored the Digambara tradition.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.GetTitledName]以秉持着天衣派信仰传统而骄傲。

original: It became known that [Root.GetTitledName] now honored the Svetambara tradition.
translation: 众所周知，[Root.GetTitledName]以秉持着白衣派信仰传统而骄傲。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pious pilgrimage to Jerusalem.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往耶路撒冷进行了虔诚的朝圣之旅。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pious pilgrimage to Constantinople.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往君士坦丁堡进行了虔诚的朝圣之旅。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pious pilgrimage to Antioch.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往安条克进行了虔诚的朝圣之旅。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pious pilgrimage to Axum.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往阿克苏姆进行了虔诚的朝圣之旅。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pious pilgrimage to Rome.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往罗马进行了虔诚的朝圣之旅。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pious pilgrimage to Canterbury.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往坎特伯雷进行了虔诚的朝圣之旅。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pious pilgrimage to Köln.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往科隆进行了虔诚的朝圣之旅。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pious pilgrimage to Santiago.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往圣地亚哥进行了虔诚的朝圣之旅。
[Root.GetTitledName]在[Root.Location.GetName]举行了一场盛大的牺牲祭典活动。

original: [Root.GetTitledName], through deeds and character, came to be known as [Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick].
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]，由于他的行为与性格，成为了众所周知的[Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]。

original: The [From.Religion.GetName] heresy spread its woeful presence in the county of [From.GetName].
[Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] ascended to the Kshatriya caste, claiming new prestige for [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty among [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers.
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]上升成为了刹帝利种姓，使得[Root.GetHerHis]家族王朝在[Root.Religion.GetName]君主当中，获得了新的威望。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] successfully led [Root.GetHerHis] armies, taking [From.GetName] from the enemy.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]带领着[Root.GetHerHis]军队，成功地从敌人手中夺取了[From.GetName]。

original: The armies of [Root.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], led by [Root.GetTitledName], captured [From.GetName].
[Root.GetDynName] established control of all the empires of India, thus declaring [Root.GetHerselfHimself] [Root.GetTitle]
translation: [Root.GetDynName]建立并控制了印度所有的法理帝国，因此宣称[Root.GetHerselfHimself]为[Root.GetTitle]。

original: Norsemen set sail in their longships and to trade and raid beyond their northern homelands in ever increasing numbers, signalling the beginning of a new age.
translation: 越来越多的北欧人乘坐着他们的龙头长船，离开世代居住的苦寒北境辗转到欧陆各地，或经商或抢劫，建立属于北欧人的天地。这正是维京时代到来的标志。

original: The centralization of power in Scandinavia, along with a rapid population expansion, has begun to drive its denizens to look beyond the home shores in earnest. New developments in shipbuilding, an adventurous spirit and a fearless belief in the Gods are now taking Norse seafarers across the seas towards distant lands. They arrive as traders, raiders and conquerors, and they call themselves 'Vikings'...
translation: 斯堪的纳维亚半岛的中央集权以及人口的迅速增长，开始促使当地居民热切地将目光投向家园的海岸之外。北欧航海者秉持着冒险精神，对众神信仰使他们无所畏惧，加之造船技术的新发展，更帮助了他们乘风破浪奔向遥远的彼岸。他们以商人，强盗甚至征服者的身份登陆，并自称「维京人」……

original: From the fury of the Northmen deliver us!
translation: 从这帮狂怒的北方佬手上救救我们吧！

original: I do not see how this concerns us.
The Viking Age begins - Norse counties receive shipyards and increased shipbuilding technology.\n
translation: 维京时代开启——诺斯国家获得船坞并且造船术科技提升。\n

original: You have, since a while, taken to wearing a pair of heavy, shaggy breeches for protection while practising your combat skills. Because of this, your kinsmen and friends have started to call you 'Ragnarr Lodbrok'.
translation: 一段时间以来，你经常穿着厚重又毛糙的短马裤来干架。由此你的亲戚朋友都开始称你为「朗纳尔·洛德布罗克」（穿着毛裤的郎纳尔）。

original: I guess there is nothing I can do about it.

Lately, you son Ragnarr has taken to wearing a pair of heavy, shaggy breeches for protection while practising his combat skills. Because of this, your kinsmen and friends have started calling him '[From.GetFirstName] Loðbrok'.
translation: 最近，你的儿子郎纳尔经常穿着又重又粗糙的短马裤来进行格斗训练。因此，你的亲戚朋友开始称他为「[From.GetFirstName] 洛德布罗克」（糙毛马裤）。

original: In our Realm, latin ways and words are increasingly melding in with our Germanic heritage. This tendency is seen above all in learned texts and matters of state and religion. Perhaps we should take the step in earnest and promote this cultural change...
translation: 在我们的领地里，拉丁文化与文字逐渐融入我们日耳曼文化之中。这种拉丁化趋势，已经漫向至我们的言语行文，领土管理方式以及宗教信仰。或许我们应该向这种高尚而先进的文化迈开全面接受的一步……

original: Many of our subjects are adopting new ways and traditions brought in by foreigners, integrating them with local customs. Perhaps we should do the same...
translation: 我们的臣民多数都接受了那些外邦人所带来的文化，并揉合自身习俗，转而像本地人一样。或许我们应当做同样的事……

original: Southern Spain is a melting pot of old and new, Christian and Muslim, Iberian and Arabic. Out of all this, a new Andalusian identity is emerging. Perhaps it is time we recognized it as our own...
translation: 南西班牙是个文明大熔炉，新的旧的，基督徒的穆斯林的，伊比利亚的阿拉伯的，通通烩集。除了这些外，一群名为安达卢西亚的新人群正展露头角。或许我们是时候认清自己是哪种人了……

original: As local traditions evolve, many people in our realm are now identifying themselves as Castillan rather than Visigoths. We could do the same...
translation: 作为本土传统文化的亚种演化，卡斯蒂利亚文化更多为我们治下的臣民所认可，他们认为自己是卡斯蒂利亚人而非西哥特人。我们或许应有相同感受……

original: As local traditions evolve, many people in our realm are now identifying themselves as Catalan rather than Visigoths. We could do the same...
translation: 由于本地传统演化，加泰罗尼亚文化更多为我们治下的臣民所认可，他们认为自己是加泰罗尼亚人而非西哥特人。我们或许应有相同感受……

original: As local traditions evolve, many people in our realm are now identifying themselves as Portuguese. We could do the same...
translation: 由于本地传统演化，葡萄牙文化更多地为我们治下的臣民所认可，他们认为自己是葡萄牙人。我们或许应有相同感受……

original: Distinct cultural traditions are evolving in the Low Countries, with many people now calling themselves Dutch. We could embrace this change ourselves...
translation: 许多生活在低地本土的当地人开始称自己荷兰人。我们应该采纳变为自己的文化……

original: More and more of our people are becoming completely latinized, adopting Italian customs and speech. Perhaps it is time we did the same...
translation: 我们的臣民已经越来越多全盘拉丁化，过着意大利人的节日，说着意大利人说话。或许我们该做同样的事……

original: Under the influence of Latin culture, many people in our realm are now adopting Occitan traditions, no longer identifying themselves as Visigoths. We could do the same...
translation: 在拉丁文化蔓延的潮流下，我们治下的臣民不断采纳奥克人的文化传统，不再认为自己是西哥特人。我们该同样这样做……

original: A new holy order has been founded for the defense and preservation of the reformed and expanding Zunist religion. They call themselves 'Knights of the Sun' and are sworn to stand steadfast in battle, protect the faithful and help spread the light of Zun the Justice-Giver to new lands. Many young warriors are already flocking to their golden standard.
translation: 一个崭新的骑士团从此建立，为守护革新又伟大尊日神教而团结在一起。他们称自己为「太阳骑士」，他们为守护信仰而洒血战场，他们在此立誓，必定要把传诵太阳的光辉把无上的公正带到世上每个角落。许多年轻的战士视加入骑士团为毕生荣光。

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Knights of the Sun in their holy mission to protect the faithful, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，要求加入太阳骑士团去担任神圣的职务捍卫那崇高的信仰，即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Knight of the Sun.

Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation will aid us greatly as we ride into battle against the enemies of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]! May His light always shine upon you and illuminate your being!

For the Knights of the Sun,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
伟大的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，你的慷慨解囊极大的帮助我们在沙场上抗击[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的敌人！愿太阳的光辉永世照亮守护你之所在！

为了太阳

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], our Order needs more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. It has come to my attention that there is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

In His light,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
最公正的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我们骑士团需要更多的城堡以训练部队和保证收入来源。而你的领地[FromFrom.GetName]，我们认为这处是一块非常合适的地方。当然，我们会支付 100 块来交换在那里建造城堡要塞的代价。

太阳的照耀下，

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The Knights of the Sun have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 太阳骑士团在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original:
Your Majesty, why this unreasonable enmity towards our Order? The Knights of the Sun seek only to serve [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and protect the faithful! Where is your dedication to our faith?

With sadness,

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
陛下，容我冒昧发问，为何要毫无理由地恶意针对我们的骑士团呢？太阳骑士只是一味侍奉[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，忠诚守护信仰的一群人！敢问你对于信仰的奉献之情何在？

令人伤心，

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Hold a Festival of the Sun with your vassals and courtiers, celebrating the summer solstice and paying homage to Zun the Giver of Light and Justice.
translation: 与你的封臣和廷臣举行太阳节庆典，庆祝夏至，同时对太阳赋予光明正义作出敬意。

original: You have begun preparations for the Festival of the Sun. You send out messengers with invitations to your vassals, expecting all to come and honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
translation: 你开始准备举行太阳节。你给你的封臣们发出邀请，并期待他们全员到场，以共同赞颂[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]。

original: Come all to celebrate His Light!

Dear vassal,
I hereby invite you to attend the celebration of the Festival of the Sun at [From.Capital.GetName].

Your Liege,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的封臣，
我于此特别邀请你前来[From.Capital.GetName]欢度太阳节。

你的领主，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Your vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has refused your invitation to the Festival of the Sun.
translation: 你的封臣，[From.GetTitledName]，拒绝前来参与太阳节庆典。

original: The Festival of the Sun is about to start, and in accordance with tradition, the festivities begin on a sunny morning. Large crowds have gathered around, and priests walk among them distributing blessings in the name of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
translation: 太阳节庆祝活动就要开始，而为了秉承传统，节庆要在日出时分开始。大量的人群聚集到广场，司祭们为人们献上以[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]为名的祝福。

original: The Festival of the Sun is over for this time. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] has been properly honored and the realm is looking forward to a bright future under His blinding gaze.
translation: 本次的太阳节庆典结束。[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名倍受人们赞颂，而他的子民继续在他耀眼的光芒下盼望着大好未来。

original: The time has come for one of the main events of the Festival of the Sun - the ceremony known as Walking Under the Sun. A sunny day is chosen, and on it Zun's faithful walk barefoot around the circumference of the temple ninety-nine times, all the while chanting pious rhymes. It is a ritual of physical and spiritual cleansing, as well as a tribute to the Radiant Lord Zun.\n\nIt is known both for inspiring great piety and for causing great physical and mental exertion.
translation: 午时已到，是时候举办太阳节最重要的活动——日下行走了。尊的虔诚崇拜者选在一个响晴日，裸足绕行神庙九十九圈，同时念诵韵文。这是灵魂和肉体的净化仪式，也是对圣光之主尊的致敬。\n\n这个仪式因鼓舞虔诚和导致巨大的身心劳累而著名。

original: Together we shall walk in His light!
translation: 让我们一齐行走在神的光芒下！

original: You walk for hours in the sun to honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. On the seventy-third lap around the temple, you start to feel a weakness and pain in your legs. You try to move forwards but your head is pounding and you struggle for breath. As you fall to your knees, you start to vomit on the ground.
translation: 为了赞颂[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名，你在太阳下行走了数小时。当围绕神庙走到第七十三圈的时候，你开始感到腿部的剧烈酸痛。你尝试强行继续步行，但你忽然头晕目眩呼吸困难。最终你双膝着地，并呕吐了起来。

original: You walk for hours in the sun to honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. As your limbs grow more tired and the heat pulses through your brain, you start to see new and clearer perspectives on some things that previously seemed too mysterious to fathom. The sun is just a large cheese and the moon speaks soothing words about your feet. Oh those feet, how they bother you. Maybe you should cut them off?
translation: 为了赞颂[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名，你在太阳下行走了数小时。你的四肢变得越发的酸痛，你的心脏剧烈跳动的感觉直冲脑门。但你却因此拥有一种更为清晰的崭新视野，你仿佛能「看」到一些神秘莫测的事物。太阳就像一块大奶酪，月亮轻吟低语，似乎在谈论你的腿。你的腿，对，怎么还能受这种事情困扰呢。不如直接把它们截掉吧？
我的智慧人生因此启发！

original: You walk for hours in the sun to honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. As your limbs grow more tired and the heat pulses through your brain, you start to feel a strange presence entering your mind. Yes, yes... the little devils that dwell underground in darkness have come to you and are sitting on your shoulder, invisible, telling you strange secrets!
translation: 为了赞颂[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名，你在太阳下行走了数小时。你的四肢变得越发的酸痛，你的心脏剧烈跳动的感觉直冲脑门。你却开始感觉有一种陌生的东西正进入你的意识当中。对，对……那些居住黑暗地下的小恶魔，正悄悄的坐在你的肩上，轻声告诉你一些奇异的秘密！
此刻世间万物都显得如此异样！

original: You walk for hours in the sun to honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. As your limbs grow more tired and the heat pulses through your brain, you turn your face upwards towards the Sun. You feel the light and warmth coarse through your mind and body, and shudder with excitement. Only now have you fully understood!
translation: 为了赞颂[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名，你在太阳下行走了数小时。你的四肢变得越发的酸痛，你的心脏剧烈跳动的感觉直冲脑门，接着你将脸朝上对着太阳。忽而感觉，阳光如此温暖仿佛像穿透你的肉体和意识，给你注入犹如兴奋感觉一般的颤抖。此时你终于感觉什么是大彻大悟！

original: You walk for hours in the sun to honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. As your limbs grow more tired and the heat pulses through your brain, you press on. You feel this ordeal is hardening you and giving you new strength. Perhaps you should take to doing similar exercises more frequently once the festival is over?
translation: 为了赞颂[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名，你在太阳下行走了数小时。尽管你的四肢变得越发的酸痛，你的心脏剧烈跳动的感觉直冲脑门，你却依旧前行。你感觉这是一场考验你并给你全新力量的严酷试炼。或许有必要在节日之后加强类似的训练？
本次仪式使我越发强壮！

original: You walk for hours in the sun to honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. As your limbs grow more tired and the heat pulses through your brain, your mind wanders and you start to see new perspectives and angles on some familiar problems. Perhaps you should start thinking outside your usual patterns?
translation: 为了赞颂[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名，你在太阳下行走了数小时。尽管你的四肢变得越发的酸痛，你的心脏剧烈跳动的感觉直冲脑门，你的意识开始四处漫游并开始从新的角度看待同一样事物。或许你该开始用不平常的思维思考人生了？

original: You walk for hours in the sun to honor [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. As your limbs grow more tired and the heat pulses through your brain, you turn your face upwards towards the Sun. As you feel His strong warmth and presence embrace you, you open your eyes and stare into His face to embrace the divine mysteries to be seen therein. You stare for a long while...
translation: 为了赞颂[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名，你在太阳下行走了数小时。你的四肢变得越发的酸痛，你的心脏剧烈跳动的感觉直冲脑门，接着你将脸朝上对着太阳。你感到太阳的温暖拥抱着你，张开双眸凝视太阳，忽觉你看到其中神圣的秘密。就这样，你凝视良久……

original: But wait... now everything went dark.
translation: 等等……怎么所有东西都乌漆墨黑。

original: The ceremony of thanksgiving to Zun the Giver of Justice is held in courtyard of the temple. All the attendants bare their heads and kneel to give thanks for the light, warmth, justice, wisdom and fertility that He gives His faithful worshipers. Bread spiced with holy saffron is passed around and consumed by the worshipers.
translation: 正义使者尊的感恩仪式在寺庙的院子中召开。参加者们脱帽并双膝跪地感谢祂将光明，温暖，正义，智慧以及丰饶赐予祂虔诚的崇拜者。崇拜者们轮流传递并食用由神圣藏红花调味的面包。

original: Many in your realm and abroad are strongly against the Iconoclast doctrine, which forbids the creation or possession of any religious images or icons and condemns it as idolatry. You could, in the interest of pragmatism, choose to renounce Iconoclasm and declare it a heresy.
translation: 在你的领国内外，有许多人都表示强烈反对圣像破坏主义教条，也就是反对禁止创设和拥有任何相关宗教的图像和偶像崇拜的教条。你可以出于实用主义的利益选择放弃圣像破坏主义并声称其为异端。

original: Orthodox Christians in the Empire will rejoice.\n
translation: 帝国境内的正统教会信徒会因此而愉悦。\n

original: [From.GetTitledName] has declared [From.GetHerHis] renunciation of Iconoclasm, denouncing it as a heresy and officially returning the Empire to Orthodoxy. [From.GetSheHe] commands all [From.GetHerHis] subjects to follow suit and again venerate the holy icons and other religious art.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]已经宣布[From.GetHerHis]废弃圣象破坏运动，谴责其是一个异端宗教并正式宣布帝国重回东正教怀抱。[From.GetSheHe]要求[From.GetHerHis]所有封臣改宗并再次敬仰圣像以及其他宗教艺术品。

original: Idolatry is an abomination - I refuse!
translation: 我拒绝！偶像崇拜是犯罪。

original: Muslim rulers will condemn you for your Idolatry.\n
translation: 穆斯林统治者会谴责你偶像崇拜的意向。\n

original: This person holds claims to these titles
translation: 这个人对这些头衔拥有宣称权

original: I've been given a title by my liege to hand out.
translation: 我获得了领主大人分发给我的一个头衔。

original: Give title to the best candidate.
translation: 将头衔授予最合适的候选人。

original: Give title to the second best candidate.
translation: 将头衔授予第二合适的候选人。

original: Give title to the third best candidate.
translation: 将头衔授予第三合适的候选人。

original: Give title to an unknown noble.
translation: 将头衔授予一位不知名的贵族。

original: Give title to someone close to you.
translation: 将头衔授予某个与你很亲近的人。

original: Ask for Help with Managing your Titles
translation: 寻求帮助以管理你的头衔

original: Ask your chancellor to help you take care of your newly acquired titles.
translation: 向外交总管寻求帮助，以管理你新获得的头衔。

original: The titles of the ruler are divided among his children and the primary heir, who is elected from among the members of the ruling dynasty. The law defaults to Primogeniture. You get no Prestige penalty for having unlanded sons, and can have a §Y30%§! larger demesne. Destruction of titles under any form of Gavelkind succession is not allowed. On succession in kingdoms and empires, new kingdoms might be created for younger sons if possible. Junior heirs always get the choice to declare independence without a war.
translation: 统治者驾崩后，头衔会被候选人中第一继承人和其他人选所继承。本继承法默认为长子优先。没有封地的儿子不会对你的威望有惩罚，以及你会获得额外 §Y30%§! 的直辖数量。在任何均分继承法之下，禁止摧毁头衔。如果继承的是帝国之下的王国，在条件允许下将会创建一个新王国头衔授予给较年幼的孩子。而低级的候选继承人总能不需要开战就能宣告独立。

original: Medieval kings and emperors fought a constant battle with their vassals over privileges, rights and obligations. The nobility, naturally, tended to favor a weak state...
translation: 中世纪的国王与皇帝们经常因为特权，权利以及义务的纠纷与封臣们大动刀兵。自然，那些地方贵族更趋向一个孱弱的中央政府……

original: Vassals are a law unto themselves, ruling their fiefs like petty kingdoms. Their obligations to their liege are minimal.
translation: 封臣们不会把国家法律放在眼里，他们视自己的封地为一个个小而独立的王国。他们对封君所尽的义务被降到最微小。

original: Vassals enjoy a very large degree of autonomy, but have to provide their liege with a fairly substantial portion of the levies.
translation: 封臣挺享受这种高程度的自治，但他们也必须提供给封君相当一部分的征召兵。

original: The powers of the nobility and the monarch are in precarious balance.
translation: 贵族与君主的权力保持着某种微妙的平衡。

original: The monarch has curbed the rights of the high nobility, relying instead on a budding bureaucracy led by the lesser nobility.
translation: 君主有着限制大贵族特权的能力，代替大贵族掌权的是有底层贵族所领导的政府官僚。

original: The Lords of the Realm are chafing under the unrestricted powers of the absolute monarch.
translation: 君主能不被控制地行使绝对的权力。

original: A centralized state is important for the liege to grow powerful, but a decentralized state might be easier to maintain.
translation: 一个集权的国家，对于君主变得强大是相当重要的。但一个内部分散国家或许能更容易维系。

original: The realm is entirely decentralized, and can effectively handle many vassals.
translation: 王国处于完全的权力离散状态，封臣们控制着地方势力。

original: The realm is somewhat decentralized, and can effectively handle several vassals.
translation: 王国处于相当程度的分散状态，一帮封臣还能有效的控制着地方。

original: The realm is neither centralized nor decentralized, a balance between effective handling of vassals and a powerful demesne for the top liege.
translation: 王国处于半集权的状态下，君主与封臣在对于地方的控制上各执对半。

original: The realm is somewhat centralized, and allows a big demesne for the top liege.
translation: 王国已处于相当程度的集权之下，君主掌握大片的直辖领土。

original: The realm is entirely centralized, and allows a much bigger demesne for the top liege.
translation: 王国处于中央集权的管理下，君主能够掌握最大程度的领土直辖权力。

original: I can go into hiding in order to greatly improve my personal security against murder plots. My prestige and diplomatic ability are likely to suffer, however, and who knows how a life in hiding may affect my personality...
translation: 为了躲开某人的谋杀计划，我可以藏匿起来以提升我的个人安全。我的威望和外交能力会受此影响，此外没人知道藏匿生活会对我造成什么影响……

original: Once the threatening danger is over, I may go out of hiding and return to public life.
translation: 那些曾经致命的威胁终于结束了，我终于能走出藏匿地，重回正常生活。

original: I can send my [Root.GetHusbandWife] into hiding in order to greatly improve [Root.GetHerHis] personal security against murder plots. [Root.GetHerHisCap] prestige and diplomatic ability are likely to suffer, however, and who knows how a life in hiding may affect [Root.GetHerHis] personality...
translation: 我将我的[Root.GetHusbandWife]送去某地藏好，以保证[Root.GetHerHis]个人安全以免遭到阴谋者谋杀。[Root.GetHerHisCap]威望和外交能力会受到影响，此外没人知道藏匿生活是否会影响[Root.GetHerHis]性格……

original: Once the threatening danger is over, I can take my [Root.GetHusbandWife] out of hiding and allow [Root.GetHerHim] to return to public life.
translation: 那些曾经致命的威胁终于结束了，我重新将我的[Root.GetHusbandWife]带出藏匿地，让[Root.GetHerHim]回归正常生活。

original: I can send my [Root.GetSonDaughter] into hiding in order to greatly improve [Root.GetHerHis] personal security against murder plots. [Root.GetHerHisCap] prestige and diplomatic ability are likely to suffer, however, and who knows how a life in hiding may affect [Root.GetHerHis] personality...
translation: 我将我的[Root.GetSonDaughter]送去某地藏好，以保证[Root.GetHerHis]个人安全以免遭到阴谋者谋杀。[Root.GetHerHisCap]威望和外交能力会受到影响，此外没人知道藏匿生活是否会影响[Root.GetHerHis]性格……

original: Once the threatening danger is over, I can take my [Root.GetSonDaughter] out of hiding and allow [Root.GetHerHim] to return to public life.
translation: 那些曾经致命的威胁终于结束了，我重新将我的[Root.GetSonDaughter]带出藏匿地，让[Root.GetHerHim]回归正常生活。

original: Is the target of a known or suspected murder plot\n
translation: 一宗被知晓或怀疑的谋杀计划的目标\n

original: Needs to be approved by your regent
Needs to be approved by your mother
Your liege has died, and the realm is in an uncertain state at the moment. Perhaps this is the right time to assert your independence?
translation: 你的领主刚刚驾崩，王国此刻处于暗流汹涌的时刻。你认为，或许正是时候去争取独立？
我再也不向任何人躬下我高贵的头颅！

original: I will renew my pledge of fealty.
translation: 我会对新君重申我对先王的誓言。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to defy your authority and assert [From.GetHerHis] independence, claiming you have no right to rule over [From.GetHerHim] anyway!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]决定反抗你的权威，坚持[From.GetHerHis]独立的权利，声称你没有任何权力统治[From.GetHerHim]！

original: You feared that the lands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] might become independent from your realm in the uncertain moment of your inheritance. Luckily, [From.GetSheHe] has instead confirmed [From.GetHerHis] loyalty by swearing fealty to you.
translation: 你担心[From.GetTitledFirstName]会趁国本不稳之际发起独立，并分离你的王国。幸运的是，[From.GetSheHe]立即前来对你宣誓[From.GetHerHis]忠诚。
真是一位可靠又忠诚的封臣！

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], we have received news that [From.GetTitledName] has chosen to go into hiding in order to try to foil a plot against [From.GetHerHis] life!
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我们收到了新消息，[From.GetTitledName]藏匿在某处，以规避有人要取[From.GetHerHis]性命的风险！
懦弱！但这不代表能救得了[From.GetHerHim]！

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], it seems that [From.GetTitledName] has finally decided to come out of hiding, no longer as fearful for [From.GetHerHis] life.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，[From.GetTitledName]似乎终于从藏匿处出来，不再担心[From.GetHerHis]生命安全了。

original: It is good to see [From.GetHerHim] again.
translation: 真开心还能见到活着的[From.GetHerHim]。

original: Now would be a good time to strike...

My [Root.GetLordLady], news has reached us that [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has sent [FromFrom.GetHerHis] [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetFirstName] into hiding in order to protect [From.GetHerHim] from a suspected murder plot.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我们得到消息，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]把[FromFrom.GetHerHis][From.GetHusbandWife][From.GetFirstName]送去藏起来了，以保证[From.GetHerHim]躲开某个想取他性命的人。

original: [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] can try, but it won't save [From.GetHerHim]!

My [Root.GetLordLady], it seems [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has brought [FromFrom.GetHerHis] [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetFirstName] out of hiding, no longer as fearful of murder plots against [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]似乎将[FromFrom.GetHerHis][From.GetHusbandWife][From.GetFirstName]带离藏匿地，不再担心有威胁[From.GetHerHim]性命的阴谋。

original: Now would be a good time to strike...
translation: 现在是再一次动手的好时候……

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], news has reached us that [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has sent [FromFrom.GetHerHis] [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] into hiding in order to protect [From.GetHerHim] from a suspected murder plot.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我们刚来的消息，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]把[FromFrom.GetHerHis][From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]送去藏起来了，以保证[From.GetHerHim]能躲开某个想取他性命的人。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], it seems [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has brought [FromFrom.GetHerHis] [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] out of hiding, no longer as fearful of murder plots against [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]似乎将[FromFrom.GetHerHis][From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]带离藏匿地，不再担心有威胁[From.GetHerHim]性命的阴谋。

original: Now would be a good time to strike...
translation: 现在是一个袭击的好时机……

original: Why can't you marry a nice [Root.Religion.GetName] boy?
translation: 你为何不嫁给一个优秀的[Root.Religion.GetName]男孩？

original: Why can't you marry a nice [Root.Religion.GetName] girl?
translation: 你为何不迎娶一个优秀的[Root.Religion.GetName]女孩？

original: This terrible isolation in hiding... it has long been fraying at your fragile soul... it's almost unbearable. Yet you must learn to live with it... you must... adapt your mind. Yes, adapt... become something else...
translation: 藏匿期间的孤寂真是太可怕了……孤独已经消磨光你脆弱的精神……太难以忍受了。或许你应该学着跟寂寞做朋友……这样你就必须试图让你的意志慢慢适应。对，适应……把它想象成其他东西……

original: And no one shall know but me!
translation: 除了我没人知道发生什么！

original: It seems that your [GetFromRelation]'s spirit has been suffering greatly from hiding away for so long, enough to drive [From.GetHerHim] insane...
translation: 似乎你的[GetFromRelation]的精神状态因为长期藏匿而承受莫大痛苦，听说好像[From.GetHerHim]快要崩溃了……

original: You sit in hiding, thinking of your enemies, how they could get to you and how you might prevent it. You go over all your plans again and again - did you really take the proper precautions? Are there any persons close to you that might plot against you? Can you really trust the guards?
translation: 你端坐于藏匿处，思考着你的敌人会怎样算计你以及你该怎样防范。你反复思索你的计划——你是否已经足够小心？有任何试图亲近你的人是共谋吗？还有，你真的相信你的守卫吗？

original: I'd better check under my bed again.
translation: 我最好再检查检查床底。

original: Hiding from your enemies, you gain little opportunity for spending time with others. Also, there is little opportunity for 'spending time' with others. You find, however, that you are getting used to it. Indeed, the absence of carnal thoughts makes you feel strangely pure and more at ease with yourself.
translation: 因为躲藏你的敌人，你只有很少的机会去接触其他人。同样的，你也很少给另一些人机会。但是你逐渐发现你慢慢地习惯了。的确，肉体的清静让你感到异常地平和，分外的祥和。

original: [From.GetFirstName] has been hiding from [From.GetHerHis] enemies for some time now, living in relative isolation. The experience seems to have changed [From.GetHerHim]. You find that [From.GetSheHe] no longer shows a physical interest in you the same way that [From.GetSheHe] used to.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]躲避[From.GetHerHis]敌人到现在有一段时间了，生活得相对比较孤立。这种体验似乎改变了[From.GetHerHim]。你发现[From.GetSheHe]不再像[From.GetSheHe]过去那样和你有同样的对肉体上的兴趣。

original: Living your life in hiding, you have much time to reflect on your situation. Sometimes there is fear, sometimes there is doubt. As the long hours pass at night, you find yourself increasingly taking comfort in religious musings. With time, the hope that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will protect you strengthens and becomes certainty.
translation: 在藏匿的岁月里，你有许多的时间反省自己的处境。有时感到恐惧，有时感到怀疑。漫漫长夜里，只有宗教的圣歌让你安静入眠。与此同时，你逐渐希望与相信[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]会拯救你于水火之中。

original: It is hard to stay in hiding for so many hours of the day, being physically inactive and unable to walk in the light of the sun whenever you wish. Though you are more secure like this, you wish you were not forced to sit here like some rat. Yes... you do feel like a wretched rat...
translation: 每天数十个小时地躲在藏匿点让你浑身难受，你无时无刻不期望放松自己漫步在阳光下。尽管现在很安全，可你还是不希望像只老鼠一样呆在暗处。对……你觉得自己就像一只猥琐的老鼠……

original: You have been spending too much time hiding in dusty, cold cellars and not getting enough fresh air. It is said that the stale air of closed rooms is unhealthy if too much time is spent there. Indeed, you aren't feeling all that well right now...
translation: 你浪费了太多的时间躲在满是灰尘的藏匿处，冰冷的房间没有足够的新鲜空气。据说，太长时间呆在密闭空间中呼吸浑浊的空气是十分不健康的。事实证明，你也感到有所不适……

original: It's very boring to sit in hiding. The hours are long, and not many pleasures are available. Luckily, there's always the joy of a good strong meal.
translation: 经常坐在藏匿处是十分无聊的。可谓时间一长，无聊尽显。幸好，这里还能吃上一顿美妙的饭。

original: Hiding from your enemies, you spend a lot of time just sitting around. As time passes, you feel yourself getting used to it. You find you don't have the energy for doing much work, but there's also no urgency, really.
translation: 为了躲避你的敌人，你花了大把时间来家里蹲。随着时间过去，你感觉越发适应这种生活。你发觉自己已经没有动力去干正事，其实那也不是多紧急的事，能不做就不做。

original: Oh, how I wish I were lying down...
translation: 嗷，我和我的床连在一起了……

original: Life in hiding is not like normal life. You see very few people, everyone else is busy and it seems they have no time to come and see you. As time passes, you find that you start to get annoyed at the few visitors you do get. You just don't know what to say to people anymore.
translation: 藏匿的生活不像普通生活。你几乎看不到其他人，所有人都好像很忙，都没时间来探望你。时间一长，你发觉自己开始苦恼于没有访客。逐渐地，你已经不知道能跟人们有什么聊得上的话题。

original: I wish they'd leave me alone.
translation: 我希望他们能离我远点。

original: Life in hiding suits you, you feel much safer now than you have felt in years. It's always better to be safe than to be sorry. Or dead, surely. You're glad that you're getting this opportunity to reflect upon all the mistakes you've made in your life. You've been taking too many risks, but you will not be so foolish again.
translation: 隐居藏匿生活很适合你，你感到以往的岁月里都没有像现在一般有安全感。安全最比遗憾来得好，也肯定比去死好。你庆幸，有这么一个机会让你反省以往生命中犯下的过错。你前半生冒过太多的风险，但你很确定，将来自己不会再这么傻缺了。

original: There's no such thing as excessive caution.

When people are out to kill you, and you sacrifice daily pleasures and companionship in order to hide from them, you do come to appreciate the little things in life and how much joy they can really bring you. Reflecting on this is making you see a new perspective, and suddenly the bigger issues seem less... big.
translation: 当有人意图谋害你时，你牺牲了日常的快乐与社交，以躲避他们，而你现在却满足于生活中的小幸福。日常的反思让你拥有一个全新的视觉看问题，突然发现那些你曾以为的大问题变得不这么的……大。

original: One cannot be first in everything.

Life in hiding is very limiting. You miss things like being outside, seeing people, enjoying good food and drink, games, merriment and companionship. When this trying time is over, you vow to compensate by living life to the fullest.
translation: 隐居藏匿的生活受到很多限制。你错失了门外的一切事物，见见朋友，吃喝玩乐，快乐与友谊。只要这段困难时光过去，你发誓要全部补偿回来。

original: Spending your time hidden away from your enemies, you don't get much outdoors time, nor do you see many people. You have taken to making the time pass by reading. You did not expect, however, that such a wonderful new world would open up to you through these books...
translation: 为了躲避那些想要你命的敌人，你没有了太多外出事件以及见不到人影。因此你花了大量时间来阅读。然而你却没有料到，阅读书籍帮你打开了新世界的大门……
我爱学习，学习使我快乐。

original: Trying to occupy your mind while hiding from enemy plotters, you have been reading some interesting new books that a friend acquired for you from a foreign bookmerchant. You study the books late into the night, fascinated with the strange mysteries that they describe. You start to think that maybe you could expand on these ideas yourself...
translation: 当你为了躲避敌人的阴谋时，你试图找些东西来消磨。你正在阅读几本，一个朋友从外国书商那给你买来的看似有趣的书籍。你通宵达旦的研读这些书籍，逐渐地你被书上神秘莫测的描写所吸引。你开始想，或许你能把这些思想付诸实践……

original: Spending time in hiding, you find it hard to sleep at night. Your mind wanders, you feel restless. Someone once said that the restless soul needs to express itself, or it shall wilt and die. Perhaps you should pick up quill and parchment and write something?.
translation: 隐居藏匿的那些日子，你发觉自己在夜里难以入睡。你心神不宁，感觉不安。有人曾经说过，灵魂之所以躁动，是需要有途径发泄，否则灵魂就会枯竭死亡。或许你应该拿起纸笔，写下些什么？

original: I'll get the hang of this yet!

Your daily religious observations will keep you safe. You say the name of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] ten times on the strike of each hour - first forwards, then backwards. Each time you do it, you feel closer to the unearthly and the divine. You can feel it stronger and stronger. Something is coming, something is changing...
translation: 你每日的祈祷会让你感到安全。你每天每小时前后反复地念叨[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名。每一次口中念及，每一次你感觉离他越来越近。而且这感觉越来越强烈。有某些事就要来临，有某些事将要改变……

original: It's frustrating and boring to hide away from the world like this. You need a little something to put a warm glow on your days. Perhaps a drink would help... ah, that's good, this is working. Perhaps another one, just one...
translation: 隐居藏匿沉闷又令人沮丧。你需要某些小嗜好让你的生活不再如此沉闷。或许一瓶佳酿会帮到你……噢，好酒！再来一瓶……

original: A powerful [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] such as me surely deserves to be recognized as something more. Perhaps the time has come to claim my place in the sun...
translation: 这个[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]头衔已经与我身份不相匹配。或许是时候将我的新头衔昭告天下……
一个崭新的王国建立了！

original: A powerful [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] such as me surely deserves to be recognized as something more. Perhaps the time has come to claim my place in the sun...
translation: 这个[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]头衔已经与我身份不相匹配。或许是时候将我的新头衔昭告天下……

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], we have received news that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has gone into hiding! This will severely compromise our efforts to assassinate [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我们得到消息称[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]藏匿了起来！我们刺杀[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]的计划要泡汤了。

original: We'll still get [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] one way or another!
translation: 我们是要追[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]一路到黑，还是另择他径！

original: You must find another way to murder your target.
translation: 你必须找其他方法去除掉他。

original: Did not recently come out of hiding\n
translation: 最近没有从躲藏点出来过\n

original: The world is a dangerous place, and devious plots are everywhere. Rumors have reached you that people are conspiring to kill you.
translation: 世界很危险，处处有阴谋。因为又有留言说，有人要杀你啦。

original: The world is a dangerous place, and devious plots are everywhere. Rumors have reached you that people are conspiring to kill your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 世界很危险，处处有阴谋。因为又有留言说，有人要杀你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]啦。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], an opportunity has arisen in your plan to rid yourself of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. We have been contacted by a secret guild of highly trained professional killers. They are master infiltrators, dressing all in black, and they are offering to 'solve your problems'. How shall we proceed, my [Root.GetLordLady]?
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，终于有一个机会让你能除掉[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]。我们已经联系上了一个受过专业训练的杀手。他们能潜藏于黑暗之中无声无息，解决你的问题。我们要干吗？我的[Root.GetLordLady]？

original: We will hire one of these dark killers.
We will hire three of them.

It seems as though [From.GetTitledName] has found an opportunity to send a secret guild of elite murderers to infiltrate the hiding place of the cowardly [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] and kill [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
translation: 看来[From.GetTitledName]雇了一个精英杀手，要找出[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]藏匿的位置并设法除掉[From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]。

original: Late one evening, as you are sitting in your hiding place, contemplating your situation, there is a sound just outside. You look up, and to your astonishment see one of the guards falling through the door, stabbed in the neck. A man clad in black enters and walks silently but swiftly towards you. As you rise to challenge him, he makes a swift movement and you feel a sharp pain in your chest. You look down and see a dagger lodged between your ribs. Your legs start to buckle underneath you, and your vision starts to blur...
translation: 夜里，你坐在你的藏匿处沉思着，忽然外面传来一声响声。你往外看到你其中一个侍卫撞进门内，脖子上还插着把刀。一个黑衣人敏捷又迅速地出现在你面前。你站起来试图抵抗，但只见那人手上一晃，你的脸颊忽感痛楚。再接着你就看见自己胸膛插上了另一把匕首。最后，你的双腿渐渐颓软，眼前事物也逐渐模糊……

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. [From.GetTitledName] has fallen victim to the assassin's knife. The plotters behind it have not been revealed.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。[From.GetTitledName]死于刺客的刀下。而且幕后主使没有被揭发。

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. [From.GetTitledName] has fallen victim to the assassin's knife. Unfortunately, the assassin was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。[From.GetTitledName]死于刺客的刀下。不幸的是刺客被抓获，供出了幕后黑手。

original: Late one evening, as you are sitting in your hiding place, contemplating your situation, you suddenly hear a sound just outside your room. You look up, and to your astonishment see one of the guards falling through the door, stabbed in the neck. A man clad in black enters and walks silently but swiftly towards you. As you rise to challenge him, he suddenly stops with a surprised face. He slowly falls into your arms, blood pouring from his mouth. Behind him you see one of your guards, wounded but with sword in hand. You thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for your narrow escape.
translation: 夜里，你坐在你的藏匿处沉思着，忽然外面传来一声响声。你往外看到你其中一个侍卫撞进门内，脖子上还插着把刀。一个黑衣人敏捷又迅速地出现在你面前。你站起来试图抵抗，但来者施展娴熟的身法，从容地闪现到你离你不足一寸的地方。就在你认为死期将至的那一刻，那人突然面目狰狞，嘴角迸出鲜血，倒在了你的脚下。而持刀站在他身后的是你那受伤的侍卫。感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的保佑，让你虎口逃生。

original: I will find those behind this!
It seems the assassin's knife failed to find [From.GetTitledName]. The instigators of the plot were not revealed, however.
translation: 看来[From.GetTitledName]安然无恙。幸运的是，你的阴谋没有被揭发。

original: It seems the assassin's knife failed to find [From.GetTitledName]. To make things worse, the assassin was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 刺客没能取[From.GetTitledName]的性命。更糟的是，刺客被抓住且供出了指使者。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], an opportunity has arisen in your plan to rid yourself of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. We have found out who delivers food to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] hiding place, and there is a possibility that we might bribe them to poison [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]. How shall we proceed, my [Root.GetLordLady]?
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，在下有一个能除掉[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的机会。我们发现了是谁一直给[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]藏匿处送去食材，所以我们可以收买那个人要他在下一次给[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]送食材时下毒。我们要干这票吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？
给多两倍的钱去收买他们。

original: This is not the way to go.
It seems as though [From.GetTitledName] has found an opportunity to poison [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] by bribing those who deliver the food to [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
translation: 看起来[From.GetTitledName]发现了能用收买给[From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]送饭的佣人，以便毒死[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的方法。

original: You are sitting dining by yourself in your hiding place. The cheese is excellent, the grapes are delightful. You take a sip of your drink, closing your eyes and savoring the sensation, imagining that you are at a great banquet. Time to try the soup.. aah it's good, very good. But that hint of a bitter taste, what is it? Oh... suddenly a pain grips your limbs. This is not good...
translation: 你正端坐于藏匿处享用你的晚餐。今天的起司格外熏香，葡萄也很甜。你泯了一口酒，闭上眼睛想象自己在享受一场盛宴。是时候尝一下饭后汤品……啊哈，也不错，十分不错。可就是余味有些苦涩，那是什么？噢……你的下腹一阵剧痛。这可不妙……

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. [From.GetTitledName] has fallen victim to the poison in [From.GetHerHis] food. The plotters behind it have not been revealed.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。[From.GetTitledName]在享用[From.GetHerHis]晚餐时候死掉。而且幕后主使没有被揭发。

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. [From.GetTitledName] has fallen victim to the poison in [From.GetHerHis] food. The plotters behind it have not been revealed. Unfortunately, the cook was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。[From.GetTitledName]在享用[From.GetHerHis]晚餐时候死掉。而计划的主谋则不得而知。但不幸的是，主厨被抓住并供出了指使者。

original: You are sitting dining by yourself in your hiding place. The cheese is excellent, the grapes are delightful. You take a sip of your drink, closing your eyes and savoring the sensation, imagining that you are at a great banquet. Time to try the soup... hmm ... there is a strange smell to it. You hesitate, then smell it again. Yes, this food is poisoned!
translation: 你正端坐于藏匿处享用你的晚餐。今天的起司格外熏香，葡萄也很甜。你泯了一口酒，闭上眼睛想象自己在享受一场盛宴。是时候尝一下饭后汤品……嗯？……这汤闻起来和平常不一样。你犹豫了，又嗅了一遍。没错，汤里有毒！

original: I will find those behind this!
translation: 我会查到背后是谁在指使！

original: It seems the plan to poison [From.GetTitledName] failed. The instigators of the plot were not revealed, however.
translation: 看来下药毒死[From.GetTitledName]的计划失败了。然而，计划的主谋没有被揭发。

original: It seems the plan to poison [From.GetTitledName] failed. To make things worse, the cook was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 看来下药毒死[From.GetTitledName]的计划失败了。更糟的是，那厨师被抓了，还把谁指使的供了出来。

original: On the death of my [GetNewRelation], my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] may have been elected [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], but I am under no obligation to accept [From.GetObjectPronoun] as my liege!
translation: 我的[GetNewRelation]已经过世，或许我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]已经被选为[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，但我没有义务接受[From.GetObjectPronoun]作为我的领主！
这国家还是应该保持统一为好。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has chosen independence from my rule.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]选择了从我的统治下独立出去。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes or vassalizes all titles in the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! belonging to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can use this Casus Belli to seize the §Y$TITLE$§!.

My [Root.GetLordLady], an opportunity has arisen in your plot to rid yourself of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. One of our agents has befriended one of the guards who have access to the hiding place. How shall we proceed, my [Root.GetLordLady]?
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，有一个除掉[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的机会出现了。我们有个手下和那人的侍卫打好了关系，可以借机进入那人的藏身之地。该动手吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？

original: Try to buy several of the guards.

It seems as though [From.GetTitledName] has found an opportunity to bribe one of the guards who watch over the cowardly [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName], thus presenting us with a chance to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
translation: 看来[From.GetTitledName]要收买[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的其中一些侍卫，不用说就是来刺杀[From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]。

original: Another morning in hiding... You have broken your fast and are preparing to receive today's news from the outside world. One of the guards knocks on the door and enters. He walks up to you, and you stretch your hand out to receive the despatches, but then gasp in surprise as the guard instead draws his sword and stabs at you. You try to shout for help, but only blood comes out of your mouth as the blade slides in between your ribs.
translation: 隐匿生活的又一天清晨……你照常吃着早餐并准备打听外面世界的消息。一个侍卫敲你的门进来。他走到你面前，你惯例伸出手准备收取信件。哪知那侍卫居然拔出剑向你刺来。当你试图求救时，嘴里喷出的却只有鲜血，因为剑刃早已刺进你的肋间。

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. [From.GetTitledName] has been cut down by one of [From.GetHerHis] own guards. The plotters behind it have not been revealed.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。[From.GetTitledName]死于[From.GetHerHis]侍卫的手下。而且幕后主使没有被揭发。

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. [From.GetTitledName] has been cut down by one of [From.GetHerHis] own guards. Unfortunately, the assassin was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。[From.GetTitledName]死于[From.GetHerHis]侍卫的剑下。不幸的是，侍卫被抓到而且供出了指使者。

original: Another morning in hiding... You have broken your fast and are preparing to receive today's news from the outside world. One of the guards knocks on the door and enters. He walks up to you, and you stretch your hand out to receive the despatches, but then gasp in surprise as the guard instead draws his sword and stabs at you. You just manage to dodge the stab, and then grab a dagger on the table next to you and drive it into the treacherous villain's abdomen. You thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for your narrow escape.
translation: 隐匿生活的又一天清晨……你照常吃着早餐并准备打听外面世界的消息。一个侍卫敲你的门进来。他走到你面前，你惯例伸出手准备收取信件。哪知那侍卫居然拔出剑向你刺来。你勉强躲开了攻击，顺手在桌上抓起一把匕首，捅向这个奸诈小人的腹部。感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，让你死里逃生。

original: I will find those behind this!
It seems the guard we bribed failed to kill [From.GetTitledName]. The instigators of the plot were not revealed, however.
translation: 看来这招借刀杀[From.GetTitledName]失败了。然而幕后黑手并没有被揭发。

original: It seems the guard we bribed failed to kill [From.GetTitledName]. To make things worse, he was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 看来这招借刀杀[From.GetTitledName]失败了。更糟的是，侍卫没死透被抓了起来，并供出是谁指使的谋杀。

original: Ogier the Dane arrives at your court.
translation: 丹麦王子奥吉尔，来到你的宫廷。
骑士罗兰来到你的宫廷。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], an opportunity has arisen in your plot to rid yourself of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. We have found a strange snake charmer who claims he has trained his little 'friends' to seek out and bite a person with deadly venom. How shall we proceed, my [Root.GetLordLady]?
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，终于出现了一个能除掉[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的机会。我们找到了一位自称「猛毒术士」的人，声称能训练它的一条毒蛇去要死某个指定的人。我们要干这一票吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？

original: Have him send all his snakes.
translation: 请他把所有的蛇都放出来咬。

original: It seems as though [From.GetTitledName] has found an opportunity to hire a strange snake charmer who trains his poisonous snakes to kill people. This presents us with a chance to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
translation: 看起来[From.GetTitledName]找了一位训练杀人用毒蛇的异邦耍蛇人。真是一个除掉[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的好机会。

original: You sleep soundly in your hiding place, dreaming of freer and happier times. Suddenly you are disturbed by something... cold and slippery... it slithers up under your blanket. Ouch! A pain in your hand... suddenly you are wide awake. You see something small but elongated dropping onto the floor, is it a rope? The pain in your hand spreads, you find it hard to breathe... why is it suddenly so cold...?
translation: 你正躺在你的隐居藏匿地酣畅大睡，做着重回以往自由快乐时光的梦。突然你被某样东西惊醒，那东西湿湿滑滑地转进你的被毯里。你害怕地抖落那东西，一条小小细长的生物掉在了地板上，就像一条绳子。还没来得及思考，你就感觉手臂剧痛，呼吸困难……为何异常寒冷……？

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. [From.GetTitledName] was bitten by a poisoned snake and died. The plotters behind it have not been revealed.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。[From.GetTitledName]被毒蛇咬伤毒发身亡。而且幕后主使没有被揭发。

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. [From.GetTitledName] was bitten by a poisoned snake and died. Unfortunately, the snake charmer was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。[From.GetTitledName]被毒蛇咬伤毒发身亡。不幸的是，那个耍蛇人被抓住并且供出了幕后主使。

original: You sleep soundly in your hiding place, dreaming of safer and happier times. Suddenly you are disturbed by something... cold and slippery... it slithers up under your blanket. You are instantly wide awake - something is wrong! You grab in the darkness and find you have something cold and scaly in your hand, twisting frenetically. You carefully light the lamp and find you are holding a small snake just below the head. Venom is dripping from its fangs as it snaps its jaws against you. You're sure this animal is not here by coincidence, and you thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for your narrow escape.
translation: 你正躺在你的隐居藏匿地酣畅大睡，做着重回以往自由快乐时光的梦。突然你感觉某种东西湿湿滑滑地转进你的被毯里。你猛然警醒，发觉事情不妙。你迅速的一手往被毯里一抓，抓到一条冰冷且长满鳞片的生物并拼命地扭动着。你小心地点亮灯光，终于看见你手里抓着的是一条小蛇。你能看见蛇的尖牙冒着毒液，向你张开着。你很清楚这条蛇绝不是偶然出现在这。感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]让你死里逃生。

original: I will find those behind this!
translation: 我会查出背后是谁在指使！

original: It seems the snake charmer failed to kill [From.GetTitledName]. The instigators of the plot were not revealed, however.
translation: 似乎用耍蛇人来刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的计划失败了。然而，他们还并没有发现是谁指使他的。

original: It seems the snake charmer failed to kill [From.GetTitledName]. To make things worse, he was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 似乎用耍蛇人来刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的计划失败了。更糟的是，耍蛇人被抓住了还供出是谁指使他的。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], an opportunity has arisen in your plot to rid yourself of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. We have found a disloyal chamber maid who says she is willing to end her [Root.PlotTarget.GetLordLady]'s life. How shall we proceed, my [Root.GetLordLady]?
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，有一个除掉[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的机会出现了。我们找到了那人的一位怀有异心的贴身侍女，侍女说她要让[Root.PlotTarget.GetLordLady]付出代价。我们应该干这一票吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？

original: It seems as though [From.GetTitledName] has found an opportunity to hire a disloyal chamber maid with access to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. This presents us with a chance to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
translation: 似乎[From.GetTitledName]找到了一名怀有异心的侍女试图刺杀[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]。这次或许是除掉[From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]的好机会。

original: Here you lie, nothing happening, nothing to look at. Why have they put you here? You would rather be out in the sun. Why does no one listen when you can't speak? Nurse! Nurse! Ah, there you are... what are you doing with that rope... nurse?
translation: 你躺在床上，无事发生，百无聊赖。他们为什么把你扔在这里？你宁愿在阳光下。如今你无话可说，为什么无人倾听？保姆！保姆！啊，你来了……你用那根绳子做什么……保姆？

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. [From.GetTitledName] was strangled in [From.GetHerHis] bed by [From.GetHerHis] chamber maid. The plotters behind it have not been revealed.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。[From.GetTitledName]被[From.GetHerHis]侍女勒死在[From.GetHerHis]床上。而且幕后主使没有被揭发。

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. [From.GetTitledName] was strangled in [From.GetHerHis] bed by [From.GetHerHis] chamber maid. Unfortunately, the snake charmer was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。[From.GetTitledName]被[From.GetHerHis]侍女勒死在[From.GetHerHis]床上。不幸的是，侍女被抓住并且供出了幕后主使。

original: Here you lie, nothing happening, nothing to look at. Why have they put you here? You would rather be out in the sun. Why does no one listen when you can't speak? Nurse! Nurse! Ah, there you are... what are you doing with that rope... yes, give it to me... no, why did the guard kill the nurse?
translation: 你躺在床上，无事发生，百无聊赖。他们为什么把你扔在这里？你宁愿在阳光下。如今你无话可说，为什么无人倾听？保姆！保姆！啊，你来了……你用那根绳子做什么……好啊，给我吧。不是，侍卫为啥要杀她？

original: It seems the chamber maid failed to kill [From.GetTitledName]. The instigators of the plot were not revealed, however.
translation: 看起来，刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的计划失败了。然而，幕后主使没有被揭发。

original: It seems the chamber maid failed to kill [From.GetTitledName]. To make things worse, he was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 看起来，刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的计划失败了。更糟的是，他们发现了幕后主使。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], an opportunity has arisen in your plot to rid yourself of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. A travelling witch claims she can provide poisoned candies which could be smuggled in as a gift. How shall we proceed, my [Root.GetLordLady]?
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，有一个除掉[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的机会出现了。有位女巫声称自己有一种剧毒的糖果，一舔就死。我们应该干这一票吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？

original: It seems as though [From.GetTitledName] has found an opportunity to hire a witch who makes poisoned candies. This presents us with a chance to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
translation: [From.GetTitledName]似乎找到了一个声称有能毒死人的糖果的女巫。这是一次杀死[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的好机会。

original: It's boring to sit here, hidden away. You hardly get out at all, there is no room to run and play and hardly anyone comes to see you. Well, at least people send you gifts to cheer you up. These candies are really nice, though they do have a strange bitter aftertaste... very bitter...
translation: 隐匿的日子枯坐无味。你几乎没有出去过，没有地方跑和玩，基本上也没人来看你。好吧，至少有人送你礼物给你鼓劲儿。这些糖果真的很不错，虽然有一种奇怪的苦涩回味……非常苦涩……

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. Apparently, [From.GetTitledName] ate the poisoned candies that the witch sent to [From.GetHerHim]. The plotters behind it have not been revealed.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。据说[From.GetTitledName]是吃了女巫送[From.GetHerHim]的糖果后死的。而且幕后主使没有被揭发。

original: News reach you that the plot to murder [From.GetTitledName] has met with success. Apparently, [From.GetTitledName] ate the poisoned candies that the witch sent to [From.GetHerHim]. Unfortunately, the snake charmer was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 消息传来，你刺杀[From.GetTitledName]的阴谋已然成功。据说[From.GetTitledName]是吃了女巫送给[From.GetHerHim]的毒糖果后死的。不幸的是，女巫被抓住并且供出了幕后主使。

original: It's boring to sit here, hidden away. You hardly get out at all, there is no room to run and play and hardly anyone comes to see you. Well, at least people send you gifts to cheer you up. These candies look really nice, but they smell funny. Hmm, the cat can have them. Here kitty...
translation: 隐匿的日子枯坐无味。你几乎没有出去过，没有地方跑和玩，基本上也没人来看你。好吧，至少有人送你礼物给你鼓劲儿。这些糖果真的很不错，但就是闻起来有点奇妙。唔，给猫吃吧。喵星人过来过来……
喵星人你怎么了……怎么了？

original: It seems the poisoned candies failed to kill [From.GetTitledName]. The instigators of the plot were not revealed, however.
translation: 看来毒糖果杀不死[From.GetTitledName]。然而，阴谋的幕后主使还是没被揭发。

original: It seems the poisoned candies failed to kill [From.GetTitledName]. To make things worse, the witch was caught and revealed who ordered the murder.
translation: 看来毒糖果杀不死[From.GetTitledName]。更糟的是，那女巫被人抓住了，还把幕后主使供出来了。

original: The influence of [From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] on your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] has been extraordinary. Through the good example of [From.GetHerHis] guardian, [From.GetSheHe] is developing into a brave young [From.GetManWoman].
translation: [From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]对于你的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]具有非同寻常的影响力。通过[From.GetHerHis]监护人的以身作则，[From.GetSheHe]逐渐变成一位勇敢的年轻[From.GetManWoman]。

original: The influence of [From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] on your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] has been extraordinary. Through constant practice with horse and blade, [From.GetSheHe] is developing into a strong young [From.GetManWoman].
translation: [From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]对于你的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]具有非同寻常的影响力。[From.GetSheHe]不断练习骑术与剑术，逐渐成为一名精壮而年轻的[From.GetManWoman]。

original: The influence of [From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] on your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] is great. [From.GetSheHe] is developing quite a taste for swordplay.
translation: [From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]对你的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]具有巨大的影响力。[From.GetSheHe]逐渐地对剑术十分感兴趣。

original: This could be good, or bad...

The influence of [From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] on your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] is great. Through the good example of [From.GetHerHis] guardian, [From.GetSheHe] is learning the ethos of a just ruler.
translation: 由于[From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]对于你的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]具有巨大的影响力。通过[From.GetHerHis]监护人的循循教诲，[From.GetSheHe]正在学习一名公正统治者该有的精神。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] has fallen most violently fallen off [From.GetHerHis] horse during practice at sword and lance with [From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，您的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]在和[From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]练习骑马与砍杀的时候，[From.GetHerHis]坐骑突然失控把他重重地摔在了地上！

original: This is a most grievous wound!
Score is capped at §Y$CAP$§! because less than §Y$MONTHS$§! months have passed and §Y$ATTACKER$§! has not yet won a major battle
translation: 得分上限在 §Y$CAP$§! 因为经过小于 §Y$MONTHS$§! 个月并且§Y$ATTACKER$§!还没有赢得一场重大主要战役

original: Your liege has died, and now someone else dare claim to be your superior. Perhaps this is the right time to assert your independence?
translation: 你的领主已经驾崩，而现在却有某个人胆敢僭为领主之位。或许这是一个合适的时机来宣称你的独立权利？

original: I will not bend my knee to a weakling!
translation: 我不会向一个无耻之人卑躬屈膝！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to defy your authority and assert [From.GetHerHis] independence, claiming you are too weak to rule over [From.GetHerHim] anyway!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]已经决定违抗你的权威以及宣称[From.GetHerHis]独立权利，并声称您过于孱弱并不能领导[From.GetHerHim]！

original: You feared that the lands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] might become independent from your realm in the uncertain moment of your inheritance. Luckily, [From.GetSheHe] has instead confirmed [From.GetHerHis] loyalty by swearing fealty to you.
translation: 你担心[From.GetTitledFirstName]会趁你统治根基不稳，从你的王国中独立出去。走运的是，[From.GetSheHe]立刻向你表示了[From.GetHerHis]忠诚，承认你的合法地位。
真是一位值得信赖的忠臣！

original:
Rather than letting civil war tear the realm apart, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to Lower the Tribal Organization. Your valuable support in this conflict will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免国家因内战而分裂，[From.GetTitledName]已经同意降低部落组织等级。你在此次冲突中的宝贵支持我们将谨记于心。

真诚的，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original: Under pressure from a powerful Faction, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to Lower Crown Authority.
translation: 迫于强大派系的压力，[From.GetTitledName]被迫同意降低王权等级。

original:
Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and lower the Tribal Organization. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求并降低部落组织度。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to lower Tribal Organization in the §Y$TITLE$§!
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!能在§Y$TITLE$§!发动降低部落组织度等级的战争

original: $ORDER$$SECOND_ADJ$ Civil War to lower Tribal Organization
Members seek to lower the Tribal Organization in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
translation: 派系成员们谋求在[This.GetName]之下降低部落组织度。当影响力足够强大，§Y[From.GetBestName]§!会向§Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!发送最后通牒。

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding lower Tribal Organization. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!提交最后通牒，要求降低部落组织度。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝了这份通牒，你所在的派系将会发起暴动。

original: The Kharijites are a branch of Islam that was marginalized and repressed early in the 7th century. They believe that any unrepentant sinner is a Kafir, also rejecting the notion of infallibility of the Caliphs.
translation: 哈瓦利吉派是伊斯兰教的一旁支派系，在公元七世纪早期遭打压与边缘化。他们认为任何不悔改的罪人都是卡菲勒，同样也拒绝接受正统哈里发的命令绝对正确的概念。

original: Now that we control Constantinople, we can restore the Orthodox Ecumenical Patriarchate. May it return to its former glory!
translation: 如今我们掌控了君士坦丁堡，因此能够恢复正统教会普世牧首一职。祈求我教能重复往日荣光！

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not refused our Call to this war
Grant a Viceroyalty to the character
Grant one of your landed titles as a Viceroyalty to another character. This will significantly improve their opinion of you. When the character dies, the title will revert back to you.
translation: 将你的实地头衔作为总督辖区授予另一角色。此举将会显著提升该角色对你的好感。当该角色死亡，头衔将回到你手上。

original: Select a title to grant as a Viceroyalty to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W.
translation: 选择一个头衔作为总督辖区授予给§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W。

original: Grant the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W as a Viceroyalty to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W, increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§W. When §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W dies, the title will revert back to you.
translation: 将§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W作为总督辖区授予§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W，[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]对你的好感将提升 §G$OPINION$§W。当§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W逝世后，头衔将会回到你手上。

original: The capital will change from §Y$CURRENT$§W to §Y$NEW$§W.

translation: 封臣会随之获得以下封臣：

original: §RMaking [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] a $TITLE$ will disqualify [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] from the succession!§!
We offer you the Viceroyalty of [ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]

Grant the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W as a Viceroyalty and all titles under it to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W, increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§W. When §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W dies, the title will revert back to you.
translation: 将§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W作为总督辖区包涵其下属的全部头衔授予§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W，此举能提升[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]对于你的好感 §G$OPINION$§W。当§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W逝世后，头衔会回到你的手上。

original: Decadence lost from grant to dynasty member: §G$DECADENCE$%§! (the effect is relative to the dynasty's current Decadence.)
translation: 授予家族成员头衔会降低腐化：§G$DECADENCE$%§!（效果和家族现在的腐化度相关。）
授予了男爵领总督头衔
授予了伯爵领总督头衔

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! must have a $TIER$ title which §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! can hold
For the good of the realm

You've been thrown into a pit dug out in the middle of the desert. The guards explain to you that you are to be judged by Zun the Justice-Giver. If you are guilty, the Sun will punish you for your crimes.
translation: 你被扔到沙漠中的一个坑里。士兵们解释到，你要将收到尊日神的审判。如果你的确罪业深重，那么太阳将会惩罚你的罪行。

original: In the Early Middle Ages, the ancient Germanic belief system is still dominant in Scandinavia and northern Germany. A pantheon of gods under the wise warrior god Odin (or Wodan) rules all the branches of the worldtree, Yggdrasil. The other two main gods are Thor (Thunar), friend to mankind, and Frey, god of fertility.
translation: 在中世纪早期，古日耳曼的信仰在斯堪的纳维亚半岛和德意志北部占主导地位。智慧的战士之神奥丁领导下的神系统治着世界树（尤格德拉希尔）的所有枝桠。另外两个主神是人类之友雷神索尔，和丰饶之神弗雷。
